tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to OKE Monitoring through OCI Logging Analytics

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Logging Analytics Connect Kubernetes Cluster
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to connect to the Kubernetes Cluster for monitoring

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Interactive Analytics and Troubleshooting
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to troubleshoot the issues occuring in the Kubernetes Cluster

tutorials.title: (ocw-23) Lab 5: Management Agent Overview
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the overview of the Management Agent

tutorials.title: (ocw-23) Lab 6: Kubernetes Solution Installation
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to set up the data ingestion to Logging Analytics for Custom Application Containers

tutorials.title: (ocw-23) Lab 7: Analyzing Logs
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to set up the data ingestion to Logging Analytics for Custom Application Containers

tutorials.title: (ocw-23) Lab 8: Designing Dashboards
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to set up the data ingestion to Logging Analytics for Custom Application Containers

tutorials.title: (ocw-23) Lab 9: Advanced Analytics with Drill Downs
tutorials.description: This live lab outlines the steps required to set up the data ingestion to Logging Analytics for Custom Application Containers

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
